_header: All worship wisdom wealth and worthiness
Title(s): ‘The Aungelles Songe within heuene’; Pèlerinage de l’âme
_description: ‘The Aungelles Songe within heuene’, in the English translation of Deguileville’s Pèlerinage de l’âme — seven stanzas rhyme royal

Bod770.First Lines:
alle worschip welþe & worþinesall bounte bewte ioi
                    & blisfulhed…
Bod770.Last Lines:
…What ioie is here ȝe schal assaie & sehoonourid
                    bethe hie mageste

OxfCCC237.First Lines:
Alle wysdom worchip welþe & worþinesseAl bounte
                    beaute Ioye & blyssefulhede…
OxfCCC237.Last Lines:
…What Ioye is here I schall asaye & seehonoured be þi
                    hygh maieste
OxfCCC237.Attributed Title: The aungelles songe with in heuene

CULKk17.First Lines:
Al worchep wisdom welthe and worthinesseAl bounte bewte Ioye and
                    blysfulhede…
CULKk17.Last Lines:
…That maner weye ȝour flesch is þat I meneSo at
                    þe laste day þei schul a Ryse…
CULKk17.Note: Stanzas 1-6 and first line of stanza 7 only.
CULKk17.Attributed Title:
her endith þe drem of þe pilgrimage of þe soule (f.
                        124v)

CamGon124.First Lines:
aL worchip wysdom welþ & worþinesse[a]L bounte bewte
                    Ioye & blisfulhede…
CamGon124.Last Lines:
…What Ioye is here ȝe schal assey & seehonoured by
                    þe hye maieste
CamGon124.Attributed Title:
The aungels songe (p. 40); Here endiþ þe drem of þe
                    pylgrimage of þe sowle translatid owt of frensche in to Englische þe
                    ȝere of owre lord Mo cccc xiijo (title for whole
                    text, p. 258)

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
All wisdom worschep welþ and worthinesAll bounte beute ioye
                    and blistefulhede…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…whatte ioy is here ȝe shall assay and sehonourede be
                    þi hye maieste

BLEge615.First Lines: All worshippe wisdam welthe and worthinesseAll bounte beawte ioye and blisfulheed…
BLEge615.Last Lines: …What ioye is here ye schul assaye & seeHonured be the hey maieste
